title: The Humble force
creator_credit: Geoff Steven, John Maynard, New Zealand National Film Unit and Phase Three Films
brief_description: Beyond the Great Wall of China lies “the power of the ancient dynasties and the new red star of communism”. This film explores the juxtaposition of China’s ancient heritage with its continuing advances into technology, communism and subtle trends into westernisation.
creator_credit_for_label: Geoff Steven, John Maynard, New Zealand National Film Unit and Phase Three Films
